title: camerashake
description: Applies shaking to the players' camera with specified intensity and duration. Parameters: 'stop' or 'add' the effect, specify player (target), intensity (float, min 0.0 to max 4.0), seconds(float, min 0.01), and shakeType (positional or rotational). Must have `Allow Camera Shake` option turned on in user settings.

fields.title: player
fields.description: A player name `string` or [`target selector`](https://learn.microsoft.com/minecraft/creator/documents/commandsintroduction#target-selectors) to identify the player.

fields.title: intensity
fields.description: Optional. Default `0.5`. A `float` that specifies the camera shake intensity with values from [0, 4].

fields.title: seconds
fields.description: Optional.  A `float` that specifies how long the camera will shake. Default: `1.0`.

fields.title: shakeType
fields.description: Optional. Either `positional` or `rotational` camera shake type. Default: `positional`.

overloads.title: Add
overloads.description: Adds shaking to a player's camera with optional `intensity`,  `seconds`, and `shakeType`.
